author: Dr Ben Miles
description:
Make MandoWife proud and get a great Displate deal using my link https://displate.com/l/benmiles or my discount code benmiles. Discounts: 1-2 Displate - 33%off,  3+ Displates - 38% off - Valid on Textra. Not valid on Lumino and Limited Edition

Scientists have just slowed down Huntington’s disease, a fatal genetic disorder once thought unstoppable. The new gene therapy called AMT-130 has demonstrated a 75% slowing of disease progression over three years in a Phase I/II clinical trial. It’s a breakthrough that's been decades in the making.

You can find out more about uniQure (not sponsored) and the trial here: https://www.uniqure.com/programs-pipeline/phase-1-2-clinical-trial-of-amt-130

If you enjoyed this, check out our other video showing how microRNA can be used to detect cancer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2oA6VIWWrdI
